ModMetaData.name: [SimplySublime] - Bok Choy
ModMetaData.author: SimplySublime & Avatarfighter
ModMetaData.description:
What is Bok Choy? Well it's a Chinese cabbage, grows fast and is nutritious. Growing time is 4 days, gives 6-7 yield per plant and provides .21 nutrition per piece.
Plain veggies not for you? Cook 5 Bok Choy with 5 meat to get 4x Bok Choy Soups that deliver a mood bonus for a yummy meal!
Why have rice when you could have, Bok Choy?
